name: Compass (V2.0)
description:
Do you hate having to restart games over because of a mistake you made?

Do you have epilepsy or or hate constant moving objects?

If you said yes to either one of those things, this game probably isn't for you.

Compass is a puzzle game where you roll a anti-gravity ball around a maze in search of an exit. The game currently has 7 levels, each with their own soundtrack and design.
